verses.text: Now when these things were \w done|strong="H3615"\w*, the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w came|strong="H5066"\w* to me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, have not \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* themselves from the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*, \add doing\add* according to their \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*, \add even\add* of the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, the \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*, the \w Ammonites|strong="H5984"\w*, the \w Moabites|strong="H4125"\w*, the \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w*, and the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*.

For they have \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* of their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* for themselves, and for their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*: so that the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* have \w mingled|strong="H6148"\w* themselves with the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \add those\add* \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*: yea, the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* and \w rulers|strong="H5461"\w* hath been \w chief|strong="H7223"\w* in this \w trespass|strong="H4604"\w*.

And when I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, I \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* my \w garment|strong="H0899"\w* and my \w mantle|strong="H4598"\w*, and plucked \w off|strong="H4803"\w* the \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* of my \w head|strong="H7218"\w* and of my \w beard|strong="H2206"\w*, and sat \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w astonied|strong="H8074"\w*.

Then were \w assembled|strong="H0622"\w* unto me every one that \w trembled|strong="H2730"\w* at the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, because of the \w transgression|strong="H4604"\w* of those that had been carried \w away|strong="H1473"\w*; and I \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w astonied|strong="H8074"\w* until the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w*.

¶ And at the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* I arose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* from my \w heaviness|strong="H8589"\w*; and having \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* my \w garment|strong="H0899"\w* and my \w mantle|strong="H4598"\w*, I \w fell|strong="H3766"\w* upon my \w knees|strong="H1290"\w*, and spread \w out|strong="H6566"\w* my \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*,\f + \fr 9.5 \ft heaviness: or, affliction\f*

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, I am \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* and \w blush|strong="H3637"\w* to lift \w up|strong="H7311"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to thee, my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for our \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* are \w increased|strong="H7235"\w* \w over|strong="H4605"\w* \add our\add* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and our \w trespass|strong="H0819"\w* is grown \w up|strong="H1431"\w* unto the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*.\f + \fr 9.6 \ft trespass: or, guiltiness\f*

Since the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \add have\add* we \add been\add* in a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w trespass|strong="H0819"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; and for our \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* have we, our \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, \add and\add* our \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, been \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*, to the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, to \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*, and to a \w spoil|strong="H0961"\w*, and to \w confusion|strong="H1322"\w* of \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, as \add it is\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And now for a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w space|strong="H7281"\w* \w grace|strong="H8467"\w* hath been \add shewed\add* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w leave|strong="H7604"\w* us a remnant to \w escape|strong="H6413"\w*, and to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* us a \w nail|strong="H3489"\w* in his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, that our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* may \w lighten|strong="H0215"\w* our \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* us a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w reviving|strong="H4241"\w* in our \w bondage|strong="H5659"\w*.\f + \fr 9.8 \ft space: Heb. moment\f*\f + \fr 9.8 \ft a nail: or, a pin: that is, a constant and sure abode\f*

For we \add were\add* \w bondmen|strong="H5650"\w*; yet our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath not \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* us in our \w bondage|strong="H5659"\w*, but hath \w extended|strong="H5186"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* unto us in the \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* us a \w reviving|strong="H4241"\w*, to set \w up|strong="H7311"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and to \w repair|strong="H5975"\w* the \w desolations|strong="H2723"\w* thereof, and to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* us a \w wall|strong="H1447"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 9.9 \ft to repair: Heb. to set up\f*
And now, O our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, what shall we \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* this? for we have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*,

Which thou hast \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, unto which ye \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it, is an \w unclean|strong="H5079"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* with the \w filthiness|strong="H5079"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*, with their \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*, which have \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* it from one \w end|strong="H6310"\w* to \w another|strong="H6310"\w* with their \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w*.\f + \fr 9.11 \ft by: Heb. by the hand of\f*\f + \fr 9.11 \ft from…: Heb. from mouth to mouth\f*

Now therefore \w give|strong="H5414"\w* not your \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* unto their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, neither \w take|strong="H5375"\w* their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* unto your \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, nor \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* their \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* or their \w wealth|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: that ye may be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w good|strong="H2898"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and leave \add it\add* for an \w inheritance|strong="H3423"\w* to your \w children|strong="H1121"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* all that is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon us for our \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w deeds|strong="H4639"\w*, and for our \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w trespass|strong="H0819"\w*, seeing that thou our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hast \w punished|strong="H2820"\w* us \w less|strong="H4295"\w* than our \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* \add deserve\add*, and hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* us \add such\add* \w deliverance|strong="H6413"\w* as this;\f + \fr 9.13 \ft hast punished…: Heb. hast withheld beneath our iniquities\f*

Should we \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w break|strong="H6565"\w* thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and join in \w affinity|strong="H2859"\w* with the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of these \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*? wouldest not thou be \w angry|strong="H0599"\w* with us till thou hadst \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* \add us\add*, so that \add there should be\add* no \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* nor \w escaping|strong="H6413"\w*?

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, thou \add art\add* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*: for we \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* yet \w escaped|strong="H6413"\w*, as \add it is\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: behold, we \add are\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee in our \w trespasses|strong="H0819"\w*: for we cannot \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee because of this.
